definitions.body: leader (lit. prob. one in front), ruler, prince;—abs. ´[[נ]] 1Sa 9:16 + 31 t.; cstr. [[נְגִיד]] ([[נְגִד]]) 2Ki 20:5 + 6 t.; pl. [[נְגִידִים]] Job 29:10 + 3 t.; [[נְגִידֵי]] 2Ch 35:8; —ruler, prince Ps 76:13, Pr 28:16, Job 29:10, Job 31:37 (in sim.). Esp.

of king of Isr.: of Saul [[עַל]] ´[[מָשַׁח לְנ]] (+ acc. pers.), 1Sa 9:16 (subj. proph.), cf. of Sol., subj. people, 1Ch 29:22, 1Ch 10:1 (subj. ´[[י]]); of David [[עַל]] ´[[חִוׇּהוּ לְנ]] 1Sa 13:14, 1Sa 25:30, [[עַל חִוׇּהוּ]] ´[[נ]] 2Sa 6:21 (in these ´[[י]] subj.), [[על]] ´[[היה לנ]] 2Sa 5:2, [[על]] ´[[היה נ]] 2Sa 7:8, 1Ch 11:2, 1Ch 17:7; cf. also 1Ch 5:2, 2Ch 6:5; of David also ´[[לְ]] ´[[נׇתַן נ]] Is 55:4; of Sol. [[חִוׇּה אׂתוֹ]] [[על]] ´[[לִהְיוֹת נ]] 1Ki 1:35 (´[[י]] subj.); of Jerob. [[על]] ´[[נתן נ]] ( + acc. pers.) 1Ki 14:7 (´[[י]] subj.); so 1Ki 16:2 of Baasha; of Hezekiah [[עַָמִּי]] ´[[נְ]] 2Ki 20:5; [[הֶעֱמִיד]] [[בְּאֶחָיו]] ´[[לְנ]] ( + acc. pers.) 2Ch 11:22 (of Abijah, subj. Rehob.); of Judah 1Ch 28:4.
of a foreign ruler or prince Ez Eze 28:2, Da 9:25, Da 9:26.

the title of some high official connected with the temple Je 20:1 (of Pashḥur) [[וְהוּא פָקִיד נׇגִיד]] ´[[בבית י]] and he was prince-overseer in, etc. (for ´[[פ]] see Je 29:26); hence [[בית האלהים]] ´[[נ]] 1Ch 9:11, 2Ch 31:13, 2Ch 35:8 (three ´[[ה]] ´[[נגידי ב]], including the high-priest), Ne 11:11; of high-priest Da 11:22 ´[[בְּרִית נ]].

ruler in other capacities (late): of tribe 1Ch 27:16, 2Ch 19:11; of Koraḥites 2Ch 9:20; of Aaronite warriors 1Ch 12:27; of division of army 1Ch 13:1 1Ch 27:4, 2Ch 11:11 (commandant of fortress), 2Ch 32:21 (in Ass. army: ‖[[שַׂר]]); of temple-treasuries 1Ch 26:24, cf. 2Ch 31:12; [[הבית]] ´[[נ]] 2Ch 28:7 (i.e. of palace?).
